caption.center: COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA, Respondent v. ADALBERTO RIVERA-DIAZ,

court.center: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Middle District.

opinion.posture: Petition for Allowance of Appeal from the Order of the Superior Court.
opinion.opinion_text: AND NOW, this 25th day of May, 2011, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.Page 1
